name: Lullaby ("lnsomnia" Games, Pimenefusarund, AzuliBean, nikita_leanne, Mohammed Diab, McZeddy, Yongqin Yu)
name_original: Lullaby ("lnsomnia" Games, Pimenefusarund, AzuliBean, nikita_leanne, Mohammed Diab, McZeddy, Yongqin Yu)
description:
Lullaby

Stumble your way into the nightmarish world of Lullaby. 

Who knows what might await in the depths of the forest?

Info

Lullaby was made by a team of six game design students, now known as '"lnsomnia" Games',  in 24 hours during the 2021 Halloween GGS Game Jam. It was  hosted by Gotland Game Students of Uppsala University - Campus Gotland.

The theme of the game jam was "Halloween/Spooky Season/Occult/Etc.". An optional keyphrase was also given - "Day of Darkness".

Awards

Lullaby won two of the five possible awards in the game jam.

  • Best Art Direction
  • Best Sound Design

Credits

Yongqin Yu, McZeddy - Programming

nikita_leanne - Environment Art and Vocals

Pimenefusarund - Character Art, Animation and Vocals

AzuliBean - Art Assets and Social Media Manager

Mohammed_Diab - Project Manager, Music and Sound Design
